# Ars Iron Compat mod repository

![Minecraft: 1.20.1](https://img.shields.io/static/v1?label=&message=1.20.1&color=2d2d2d&labelColor=4e4e4e&style=flat-square&logo=data:image/png;base64,)
![Forge: 1.20.1-47.4.10](https://img.shields.io/static/v1?label=&message=1.20.1-47.4.10&color=2d2d2d&labelColor=4e4e4e&style=flat-square&logo=data:image/png;base64,)

This project is a compatibility mod between Ars Nouveau and Iron's Spells 'n Spellbooks mods.
It is available for Minecraft 1.20.1 with FML 47.4.10 and newer.

## Running the project

### Requirements

- Java Development Kit 17

### How to

First, you must import the project in you favorite IDE (preferably IntelliJ or Eclipse) as a Gradle project.
Then you can run the Gradle task `build` to pull all the dependencies (if you get a warning about method mappings in
LightningEntityMixin, run `build` again to clear the warning), and the task `gen<YourIDE>Runs` to generate the run
configurations. You can run the `runClient` configuration in your IDE to start a Minecraft instance with the mod and its
dependencies.
